Headline: #103 West 103rd Temporary Reroute at 103rd/Talman
ShortDescription: 103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Kedzie, 99th, Western & 103rd, due to street blockage near 103rd/Talman.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 103rd, Kedzie, 99th, Western, then resume their normal on 103rd, due to street blockage near 103rd/Talman.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Michigan/Chicago
ShortDescription: Revised: NB 146 Inner LS/Michigan Exp buses temp rerouted via Michigan, Ontario, State, Chicago & Michigan, due to police activity near Michigan/Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revised: Northbound #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Ontario, State, Chicago and Michigan, due to police activity near Michigan/Chicago.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Chicago
ShortDescription: 147 Out DuSable LS Exp buses temp rrtd SB: Mchgn, Chicago, Stt, Ohio, Mchgn; NB: Mchgn, Ontario, Stt, Chicago, Mchgn; due to police activity at Michigan/Chicago

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police activity near Michigan/Chicago.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, Chicago, State, Ohio and Michigan.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Ontario, State, Chicago, Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Chicago
ShortDescription: 151 Sheridan buses temp. rrtd SB: Mchgn, Chicago, State, Ohio, Mchgn; NB: Mchgn, Ontario, State, Chicago, Mchgn; due to police activity near Michigan/Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police activity near Michigan/Chicago.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, Chicago, State, Ohio and Michigan.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Ontario, State, Chicago, Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Superior
ShortDescription: 3 King buses temp. rerouted in both directions due to police activity near Michigan/Superior.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King buses temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police activity near Michigan/Superior.

Southbound buses will operate via Fairbanks, Chicago, Ohio and Michigan.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Superior, and Fairbanks.

Allow extra travel time.
